rev.desc.rev.desc: CI display name should be save into the displayName field of a subscription record
add line in panel: get.record.id
$L.void=rtecall("refresh", $L.errcode, $L.cartItem)
Fix the defect of "related action id" is "NULL" when failed to create Change
Modify panel: get.record.id
Fix the defect of "related action file name" and "related action id" not added to svcCartItem table.
Line 11 in pannel set.Subscription.fields
As an agreement operator, I can define an agreement.
init agreement category and title for Subscription
In CMDB – in “Business Services” in Subscribers section add two new columns to show Service Level details for this Service:
Service Catalog fulfillment (Change) fails if the Link record refers to $L.related in the Post Expressions
Modify panel: fill.info
Add statement as below:
$L.related=$L.record
if (not (null(expressions in $L.link.record))) then for $L.i = 1 to lng(denull(expressions in $L.link.record)) do ($L.junk=evaluate($L.i in expressions in $L.link.record))
if (not (null(1 in javascript.pre in $L.link.record))) then js(1 in javascript.pre in $L.link.record)
$L.record=$L.related
Expose Change Catalog in Service Request Catalog
change panel: trigger.on to enable trigger
Recompiled
Modified to place the related record filename and ID into the cart item.
Changed decide.exit panel to exit to $normal instead of $2!
Modified to set the displayname to the serviceName in subscription and if that field is null, then set it to displayName of subscription
Recompiled.
Recompiles
Check for existence of teh field displayName before populating it.
deleted update.cm3r panel which was not being used.
Story 1364:
Modified set.foreign.id panel to set the displayName for the record if a request.
Modified to generic names and calls for both change and request records. Changed $chm.id to $releated.record.id and update.cm3r to update.related.record.
DE789 - Panel: set.Subscription.fields
Added 2 lines to set values for the svcCatItem and svcCatItemDesc fields
Panel set.Subscription.fields
Added new line:
serviceSLA in $L.Subscription=serviceSLA in $L.cartItem
Added call to sc.activity to add an entry to activitySubscription when Change record is created.

After Process is called, added check to see if Subscription record should be created. If so, Subscription record created, and the associated cm3r record's foreign.id field is updated with the subscriptionID from the created Subscription rec.

descript.descript: CI display name should be save into the displayName field of a subscription record
add line in panel: get.record.id
$L.void=rtecall("refresh", $L.errcode, $L.cartItem)
Fix the defect of "related action id" is "NULL" when failed to create Change
Modify panel: get.record.id
Fix the defect of "related action file name" and "related action id" not added to svcCartItem table.
Line 11 in pannel set.Subscription.fields
As an agreement operator, I can define an agreement.
init agreement category and title for Subscription
In CMDB – in “Business Services” in Subscribers section add two new columns to show Service Level details for this Service:
Service Catalog fulfillment (Change) fails if the Link record refers to $L.related in the Post Expressions
Modify panel: fill.info
Add statement as below:
$L.related=$L.record
if (not (null(expressions in $L.link.record))) then for $L.i = 1 to lng(denull(expressions in $L.link.record)) do ($L.junk=evaluate($L.i in expressions in $L.link.record))
if (not (null(1 in javascript.pre in $L.link.record))) then js(1 in javascript.pre in $L.link.record)
$L.record=$L.related
Expose Change Catalog in Service Request Catalog
change panel: trigger.on to enable trigger
Recompiled
Modified to place the related record filename and ID into the cart item.
Changed decide.exit panel to exit to $normal instead of $2!
Modified to set the displayname to the serviceName in subscription and if that field is null, then set it to displayName of subscription
Recompiled.
Recompiles
Check for existence of teh field displayName before populating it.
deleted update.cm3r panel which was not being used.
Story 1364:
Modified set.foreign.id panel to set the displayName for the record if a request.
Modified to generic names and calls for both change and request records. Changed $chm.id to $releated.record.id and update.cm3r to update.related.record.
DE789 - Panel: set.Subscription.fields
Added 2 lines to set values for the svcCatItem and svcCatItemDesc fields
Panel set.Subscription.fields
Added new line:
serviceSLA in $L.Subscription=serviceSLA in $L.cartItem
Added call to sc.activity to add an entry to activitySubscription when Change record is created.

After Process is called, added check to see if Subscription record should be created. If so, Subscription record created, and the associated cm3r record's foreign.id field is updated with the subscriptionID from the created Subscription rec.
